Name: Entity Identifier Code
Notes: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Name: Name
Remarks: R0203: At least one of N1-02 or N1-03 is required

Name: Identification Code Qualifier
Notes: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)
Remarks: P0304: If either N1-03 or N1-04 is present, then the other is required

Name: Identification Code
Notes: Code identifying a party or other code
Remarks: This segment, used alone, provides the most efficient method of providing organizational identification. To obtain this efficiency the "ID Code" (N104) must provide a key to the table maintained by the transaction processing party.

Name: Entity Relationship Code
Remarks: N105 and N106 further define the type of entity in N101.

Notes: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual
